reviews.comment: This used to be an amazing app. The current bloated garbage version is nearly impossible to use. Those responsible should be publicly shamed.
reviews.author: Mack Manning

reviews.title: Hate how everything goes to a web page
reviews.comment: Can\'t you keep everything inside the app instead of always going back and forth between the app and the browser?  Otherwise, the interface is alright.  Scores section should be at the very top, but the very bottom.
reviews.author: Kevin Moore

reviews.title: Gr8 app
reviews.comment: This app is great for killing time and catching up on the world of sports
reviews.author: Ryan Pendergast

reviews.comment: Very useful app. Allowed me to delete 4 other sports related applications.
reviews.author: tyler truax

reviews.title: This app is amazing!
reviews.comment: I love the access to ultimate news.  This is the best app for ultimate players. do app FTW!
reviews.author: Jay Drescher

reviews.title: I love kittys and this app
reviews.author: Jeff Trosvig
